description:
DO YOU WANT BUILD A WEBSITE EASILY? LEARN THE NEW HTML5?
Become A TOP WEBMASTER?
And You DO NOT KNOW HOW TO DO IT?

JOIN THIS COURSE AND MAKE YOUR PROFESSIONAL WEBSITE FROM SCRATCH!

You don't need any experience to take this course. However, if you have some knowledge, this course will be a great refresher on all HTML codes and introducing you for the new tags HTML5.

Throughout the course, we'll be building a handful of simple websites step-by-step, personal or professional, and be transformed from a total beginner to a expert webmaster: I think you'll be excited to learn!

Introducing excellent, online HTML & HTML5 training that allows you to learn at your pace without spending entire days at a time away from the office or your college. The course includes basic introductory lessons to HTML and HTML5 codes. You learn commands and techniques for creating a Table, Adding new Images, create Form, Links, Input methods, Lists methods, div tag, Iframe, AppChace, insert a Javascript and more codes with easy. You will become familiar with the editor Brackets, web page customization, Adding pages to your site, create the homepage, Managing your website, insert Audio and Video Input, Geolocation, WebStorage, Drag&Drop, Canvas, creating a dynamic website!

Why pay hundreds, if not thousands of dollars for HTML & HTML5 training when you can receive high quality, interactive, web-based Html training at a fraction of the cost?

"The course is presented via an intuitive, easy-to-use interface, allowing you to learn at your own pace."

ARE YOU READY TO LEARN THE LAST HTLM LANGUAGE? AND BUILD A PROFESSIONAL WEBSITE NOW!!


The course package:

- 37 video tutorials (about 8.00 hours total)
- 4 Levels: Basic, Intermediate, Advanced and Expert
- Videos available, 24 hours on 24
- Learn when you want (every day or week-end)
- Build a Professional Website!


The course outline:
- What Is HTML/HTML5?
- History and HTML5 vs Flash
- Brackets Editor HTML
- Head, meta tag, paragraph
- Links, CSS, Images
- Comment, DIV & Span, Indentation
- Tables, Lists, Forms and Input
- AppChace, Entities, Javascript
- Iframes, Audio & Video, Drag & Drop
- WebStorage, Geolocation and Canvas
title: Learn HTML and HTML5 to Build Your Web Developer Future
